{{cpp/io/ios_base/title|setf}}
{{cpp/io/ios_base/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|
fmtflags setf( fmtflags flags );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|
fmtflags setf( fmtflags flags, fmtflags mask );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Sets the formatting flags to specified settings.

@1@ Sets the formatting flags identified by {{c|flags}}. Effectively, the following operation is performed {{c|1=fl = fl {{!}} flags}} where {{tt|fl}} defines the state of internal formatting flags.

@2@ Clears the formatting flags under {{c|mask}}, and sets the cleared flags to those specified by {{c|flags}}. Effectively the following operation is performed {{c|1=fl = (fl &amp; ~mask) {{!}} (flags &amp; mask)}} where {{tt|fl}} defines the state of internal formatting flags.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|flags, mask|new formatting setting. {{c|mask}} defines which flags can be altered, {{c|flags}} defines which flags of those to be altered should be set (others will be cleared). Both parameters can be a combination of the [[#Formatting flags|formatting flags]] constants}}
{{par end}}

=====Formatting flags=====
{{cpp/io/ios_base/fmtflags consts}}

===Return value===
The formatting flags before the call to the function.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;numbers&gt;

int main()
{
    const double PI = std::numbers::pi;
    const int WIDTH = 15;

    std::cout.setf(std::ios::right); // equivalent: cout &lt;&lt; right;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setw(WIDTH / 2) &lt;&lt; "radius"
              &lt;&lt; std::setw(WIDTH) &lt;&lt; "circumference" &lt;&lt; '\n';

    std::cout.setf(std::ios::fixed); // equivalent: cout &lt;&lt; fixed;
    for (double radius = 1; radius &lt;= 6; radius += 0.5)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setprecision(1) &lt;&lt; std::setw(WIDTH / 2)
                  &lt;&lt; radius
                  &lt;&lt; std::setprecision(2) &lt;&lt; std::setw(WIDTH)
                  &lt;&lt; (2 * PI * radius) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=&lt;nowiki/&gt;
 radius  circumference
    1.0           6.28
    1.5           9.42
    2.0          12.57
    2.5          15.71
    3.0          18.85
    3.5          21.99
    4.0          25.13
    4.5          28.27
    5.0          31.42
    5.5          34.56
    6.0          37.70
}}
